attributes.action: ensure that Spain deals with the continued racism toward Lewis Hamilton in an open and pro-active way or we the undersigned will begin to boycott Spanish goods and products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is terrible that in the 21st Century this sort of racism can still occur. 

If we are to be successful in bringing up a generation of young people who are tolerant and understanding, we must support our Black and Minority Ethnic role models.

Lewis Hamilton has achieved a huge amount lets not allow this to be undermined by ignorance.

If we boycott Spanish goods and products we send a clear message that we will not tolerate this behaviour in any way.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
